title: Rhubarb crumble cake
ingredients: ['250g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '250g plain flour', '2 eggs, beaten', '250ml soured cream', '365g chopped rhubarb', 'Topping', '200g caster sugar', '50g butter, softened', '4 tablespoons plain flour', '1 pinch ground cinnamon']
